abstract: All relevant ethical guidelines have been followed; any necessary IRB and/or ethics committee approvals have been obtained and details of the IRB/oversight body are included in the manuscript.
author: Alfredo Guillen-del-Castillo; Fernando Salvador; Arnau Monforte-Pallares; Benito Almirante; Simeon Eremiev; Adrian Sanchez-Montalva; Nuria Fernandez-Hidalgo; Abiu Sempere-Gonzalez; Juan Espinosa-Pereiro; Marta Miarons; Salvador Augustin; Julia Sampol; Andres Anton; Xavier Dura-Miralles; Julia Selares-Nadal; Santiago Perez-Hoyos; Pau Bosch-Nicolau
title: Early outcomes of tocilizumab in adults hospitalized with severe COVID19. An initial report from the Vall dHebron COVID19 prospective cohort study.

funding.funding-statement: No specific funding was received for this study.
